widgets.title: Modernizr - Browser Capabilities

widgets.html:
This Widget uses a Data Source which loaded data from another Data Source, using 

Cyclotron.dataSources['green-cities']
    .execute()
    .then(function(result) { 
        ... 
    });
This works by executing the upstream Data Source and waiting for the result.

This Widget uses a Data Source which loaded data from another Data Source, using 

Cyclotron.dataSources['green-cities-preloaded']
    .getCachedData();
This works if the upstream Data Source has already been executed (e.g. with Preload: true)

This Widget uses a Data Source which loaded data from another Data Source, using 

var p = Cyclotron.dataSources['green-cities-preloaded']
    .getPromise();
    p.then(function(result) {
        ...
    });
This works if the upstream Data Source is being executed independently, and may or may not be complete.

widgets.title: Rejects Promise then Throws Error in Error Handler
